name: Yordle Party
description:
Hello. Yordle Party is an attempt at creating a Visual Novel using Tyranobuilder. It's based on fuzzy characters from a certain MOBA game.

You are a young yordle, a fae creature that usually resembles bipedal woodland mammals trying to discover his place in the worlds.

==

This project is free and non-commercial.  However, due to the risks brought by using someone else's IP for a gay nsfw VN the game in its current incarnation is shelved and uploaded here as a proof of concept and for portfolio use. 

Another VN using this game as a skeleton but with Original Characters will be available in the future. Thank you for reading.
